cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
You'll be surprised at the great condition of this 16 year old car. A steal, at only 100000 miles.
Start your mini-adventure in this mini-SUV with just 75000 miles on it.
Built to last, a great investment, and only 15000 miles driven.
Something about spending life in your car. But that's a good thing...
